context: I like Laura Ingalls Wilder. Could you recommend any of her books?
Sure! She is a very talented author. Have you read The Little House Collection?
No I haven't. When was the collection released?
rec: Little House In The Big Woods
resp: They were released in the 1930's. Little House in the Big Woods was in 1932, and Little House on the Prairie was 1935. They are very popular books.
